segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and freeze—what's going on here?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is gushing water over the edge, unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't noticed, still drying her plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, yet she carries on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I spot the boy on the stool, reaching high for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting back—oh my gosh!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in one hand, cookies in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's there too, arm up, waiting eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're conspiring for treats behind mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, totally at odds with this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such hidden chaos in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is wild, all happening under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long until it all comes crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR
